thread.title: Patrick Patterson tripped, fell, and still knocked the ball away from Derrick Rose
thread.title_full: Patrick Patterson tripped, fell, and still knocked the ball away from Derrick Rose

author: Whitney Medworth
title: Patrick Patterson tripped, fell, and still knocked the ball away from Derrick Rose
text:
Right place at the right time!
Sometimes you just happen to be in the right place at the right time. For Patrick Patterson, you can trip over the lines on the floor and still come away with a steal. Derrick Rose dribbled right to him and Patterson was either smart enough to get his hands in there or was protecting himself from getting stepped on.
This is also a good summary of the Knicks ’ season if we’re being honest.
